name: International Conference on Addiction & Psychiatry
content: We are delighted to invites you to International Conference On Addiction & Psychiatry which is going to held on March 23-24, 2023 at Paris, France which is mainly conducted this conference with the theme "To discover and to develop new strategies in the arena of Addiction and Psychiatry". We are emphatically welcome to all the authors, eminent researchers, professors, students and delegates to make their valuable presence in this approach to witness the valuable discussions and contribute to the longer term innovations in the field of medicine, life science, technology, especially in the departments of addiction and psychiatry. It is an international platform to proof of your knowledge on this concept of addiction and psychiatry in all over the global. This conference will also develop your opinions and achievements in field of addiction and psychiatry.
